descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add
options.description: Add an attachment to a message

options.name: Download
options.description: Download an attachment from a message

options.name: Get
options.description: Retrieve information about an attachment of a message

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Retrieve information about the attachments of a message

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

name.description: The name of the calendar to create

values.hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be attached

options.name: bccRecipients
options.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses of BCC recipients

options.name: categories
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

options.name: ccRecipients
options.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses of CC recipients

values.name: name
values.description: Name of the header

values.name: value
values.description: Value to set for the header

options.name: from
options.description: The owner of the mailbox from which the message is sent. Must correspond to the actual mailbox used.

options.name: importance
options.description: The importance of the message

options.name: bodyContentType
options.description: Message body content type

options.name: isReadReceiptRequested
options.description: Whether a read receipt is requested for the message

options.name: replyTo
options.description: Email address to use when replying

options.name: saveToSentItems
options.description: Whether to save the message in Sent Items

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: filter
options.hint: Search query to filter folders. More info.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

fields

filtersNotice.displayName: Fetching a lot of messages may take a long time. Consider using filters to speed things up
filtersNotice.name: filtersNotice

filtersUI.name: filtersUI

values.name: search
values.description: Only return messages that contains search term. Without specific message properties, the search is carried out on the default search properties of from, subject, and body. More info.

options.name: custom
options.hint: Search query to filter messages. More info.

options.name: foldersToExclude
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

options.name: foldersToInclude
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

options.name: readStatus
options.hint: Filter messages by whether they have been read or not

options.name: receivedAfter
options.description: Get all messages received after the specified date. In an expression you can set date using string in ISO format or a timestamp in miliseconds.

options.name: receivedBefore
options.description: Get all messages received before the specified date. In an expression you can set date using string in ISO format or a timestamp in miliseconds.

options.name: sender
options.description: Sender name or email to filter by

filtersUI.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

replyToSenderOnly.name: replyToSenderOnly
replyToSenderOnly.description: Whether to reply to the sender only or to the entire list of recipients

toRecipients.name: toRecipients
toRecipients.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients
toRecipients.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of email addresses of recipients

responseType.name: responseType

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

responseType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

defineForm.name: defineForm

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

formFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'calendar' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'calendar' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'contact' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'givenName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'surname'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'givenName'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'contactId'
IF resource == 'contact' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'draft' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'bodyContent'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'draftId'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'draftId'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'draftId'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'to'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'draftId'
IF resource == 'draft' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'event' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'startDateTime'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'endDateTime'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromAllCalendars'
IF fromAllCalendars == False AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'calendarId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'eventId'
IF resource == 'event' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'folder' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF returnAll == True AND resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filtersNotice'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filtersUI'
IF filterBy == 'search' THEN SHOW parameter 'search'
IF filterBy == 'filters' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'folderMessage' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF output == 'fields' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'fields'
IF returnAll == True AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filtersNotice'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filtersUI'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'move' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'move' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyToSenderOnly'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF replyToSenderOnly == True AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'reply' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'toRecipients'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'bodyContent'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'toRecipients'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'subject'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'responseType'
IF responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'defineForm'
IF defineForm == 'json' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF defineForm == 'fields' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'formFields'
IF fieldType IN ["hiddenField", "html"] THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldLabel'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldName'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementName'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "date", "file", "html", "hiddenField", "radio", "checkbox"] THEN HIDE parameter 'placeholder'
IF fieldType IN ["text", "number", "email", "textarea"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "radio"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'radio' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF multiselect == True AND fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselectLegacyNotice'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselect'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'limitSelection'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'exact' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberOfSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'minSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxSelections'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'html'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'multipleFiles'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'acceptFileTypes'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'formatDate'
IF fieldType IN ["html", "hiddenField"] THEN HIDE parameter 'requiredField'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'approvalOptions'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'approveLabel'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'buttonApprovalStyle'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'disapproveLabel'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'buttonDisapprovalStyle'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeAmount'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeUnit'
IF limitType == 'atSpecifiedTime' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxDateAndTime'
IF responseType IN ["freeText", "customForm"] AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF returnAll == False AND resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'messageAttachment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
